attributes.action: Give everyone over 50 years old in Wales a free heart check up every 5 years.
attributes.background: If you live in England and over 50 years old, you are entitled to a FREE heart health check every FIVE years. This isn't available to anyone of the same age living in Wales. Vaughan Gething MP says that these 'health checks are unlikely to be beneficial'. I think they would be. Do you have a heart?

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Welsh Assembly has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Assembly, you can find out more here:
http://www.assembly.wales/en/gethome/e-petitions/Pages/e-petitions.aspx
